mapper.sql: ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, ORG_ALIAS, FQUN, PARENT_ID, TF_PROVINCE, TF_CITY, TF_DISTRICT, TF_ADDRESS, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE
mapper.select:
select o.org_id "id",o.org_name "text" from td_org_info o
o.fstate = '01'
and ((o.org_name REGEXP #{conditiions.searchParams, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) or (o.org_ailias REGEXP #{conditiions.searchParams, jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
and o.org_type = #{conditiions.orgType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by o.org_name
mapper.insert: insert into TD_ORG_INFO (ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, ORG_ALIAS, FQUN, PARENT_ID, TF_PROVINCE, TF_CITY, TF_DISTRICT, TF_ADDRESS, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) values (#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fqun,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tfProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tfCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tfDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tfAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into TD_ORG_INFO
ORG_ID,
ORG_NAME,
ORG_ALIAS,
FQUN,
PARENT_ID,
TF_PROVINCE,
TF_CITY,
TF_DISTRICT,
TF_ADDRESS,
CREATE_DATE,
MODIFY_DATE,
#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orgAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fqun,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tfProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tfCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tfDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tfAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update TD_ORG_INFO
ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ALIAS = #{orgAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FQUN = #{fqun,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TF_PROVINCE = #{tfProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TF_CITY = #{tfCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TF_DISTRICT = #{tfDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TF_ADDRESS = #{tfAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TD_ORG_INFO set ORG_NAME = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_ALIAS = #{orgAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FQUN = #{fqun,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TF_PROVINCE = #{tfProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TF_CITY = #{tfCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TF_DISTRICT = #{tfDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TF_ADDRESS = #{tfAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
